channel.title: Developmental Disability on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Developmental Disability on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: Hepatitis B triple series vaccine and developmental disability in US children aged 1-9 years
item.description: The risk of developmental delay was 9 times higher for those vaccinated against hepatitis B than for the unvaccinated ones.
